title: Manage a Pet Application
description: A new tenant in a pet-friendly building wants to get a dog and must go through the pet application process.

tasks.description: Provide the tenant with the pet application form and explain the process, including any fees or pet rent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant receives the application and understands the terms.

tasks.description: Review the submitted application, including the pet's breed, size, and vaccination records, to ensure it complies with the building's pet policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the pet meets the property's rules.

tasks.description: Approve the pet, collect the pet deposit, and have the tenant sign a pet addendum to the lease.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pet is officially approved and all necessary paperwork and fees are completed.
